titles.title: A bill to provide civil penalties for the manufacturing or entering into commerce of imitation firearms which do not have markings to make them readily identifiable.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 12/19/1987--Introduced. Makes it unlawful for any person to manufacture, enter into commerce, or receive any toy, look-alike, or imitation firearm which does not have specified markings. Excludes certain nonfiring replicas and air guns from such marking requirements. Establishes civil and criminal fines for violations of this Act.
